message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $90?
I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87.50. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  $88.50 is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to be fair, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm not sure I can go much higher than that. Can you meet me at that price?
